title: How useful is Quick Books for an accountant? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have worked on QBO for a long time… If you are an accountant then QBO (Quickbooks online) shall be useful in following ways: Bank reconciliation - one of the most painful work of an accountant. In QBO you pass entries based on the transactions downloaded by QBO. Hence it reduces the chances of mismatch between your account balance and bank balance.Invoicing - QBO makes invoicing easier. Its easy interface enables anybody to prepare and send the invoice directly to client through the QBO system. It saves Paper. it tracksRecurring entries- For entries like rent you can make it recurring so there is not need to pass entry every month.Estimated - You can prepare quotations for customer and later it can be converted into invoice.Reporting - QBO generated beautiful reports of various types which helps in analysing the overall profitability, performance, indirect taxes, expenses, customer overdues, supplier overdues etc.Cloud Software - It enables anytime and anywhere access feasible for the business owners and for accountant too. It can be run even in an android app.Dashboard - QBO Comes with classic dashboard with various indicators which helps understanding the business even without opening the reports.Project/Product wise and Location wise reporting - Through QBO you can classify Income and Expenses in Projects or Locations and later on it enables to see the profit and loss from each of the project or location.Customer support of QBO is fantastic. They try to resolve the issue as soon as possible and even they customise based on your need.If you need personalised help then please contact us on 9168822242.
